remarks: If ` Y ` is a multiple of ` _pi ` then it belongs to an open inerval ` ( A (,) B ) ` such that for any other point ` y ` in the interval, cos y/2 and sin y/2 are non zero.  Such an interval is needed to apply De L'Hopital theorem.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dirkercncflem1.a $e |- A = ( Y - _pi ) $.
dirkercncflem1.b $e |- B = ( Y + _pi ) $.
dirkercncflem1.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. RR ) $.
dirkercncflem1.ymod0 $e |- ( ph -> ( Y mod ( 2 x. _pi ) ) = 0 ) $.
dirkercncflem1 $p |- ( ph -> ( Y e. ( A (,) B ) /\ A. y e. ( ( A (,) B ) \ { Y } ) ( ( sin ` ( y / 2 ) ) =/= 0 /\ ( cos ` ( y / 2 ) ) =/= 0 ) ) ) $.
$d Y y $.
$d ph y $.
